page.title: 05OUTWOOD JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS WELL OVER 100 YEARS OLD.IT IS A VERY BIG BUILDING BUILT MAINLY OF BRICK BUT WITH EXTRA CLASSROOMS BUILT OF WOOD ON THE SAME SITE. THERE IS A SCHOOL KITCHEN WHERE WE HAVE SCHOOL LUNCH PROVIDED. REALLY THERE ARE TWO SCHOOLS WITHIN ONE BECAUSE THERE IS AN INFANT SCHOOL ON THE SITE AS WELL. CHILDREN START IN THE NURSERY AND GO TO THE INFANT SCHOOL WHEN THEY ARE 5 YEARS OLD, THEN WHEN THEY ARE 7 THEY COME TO OUR SCHOOL. AT 11 YEARS WE ALL LEAVE AND GO TO THE 'GRANGE' COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL. IN SEPTEMBER 1985 THE INFANT AND JUNIOR SCHOOLS ARE JOINING TOGETHER AS ONE. WE HOPE THERE WILL BE A NEW BUILDING HOUSING BOTH SCHOOLS SOON.
